ValidationRule.description: "Existing MS Customer License Agreement #" field is required if Microsoft (MS) Embedded Request Type = "Add Dell to Existing CLA" & Microsoft (MS) Embedded Request Type = "New Registration for Existing Customer"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Request_OEM_Tech_Partner_Support',ISBLANK(TEXT(Existing_MS_Customer_License_Agreement__c)), OR(ISPICKVAL(Microsoft_MS_Embedded_Request_Type__c, 'Add Dell to Existing CLA'), ISPICKVAL(Microsoft_MS_Embedded_Request_Type__c, 'New Registration for Existing Customer')))
